title: Add iCloud Drive path search capability
description: Extend search to iCloud Drive location: ~/Library/Mobile Documents/com~apple~CloudDocs/. This is a special case due to very long path and sync behavior. Check if file exists and is downloaded (not just in cloud). Warn if file is pending download.
notes: Subtask of 89. COMPLETED: Added 'iCloud Drive Search (Extended Fallback)' section to smart-bootstrap.md (lines 171-227). Implements recursive search in iCloud Drive path with 5-level depth limit for performance. Handles downloaded files vs placeholders (.icloud extension, zero bytes). Warns users when file is cloud-only and not downloaded. Includes two example interactions: successful find in iCloud, and pending download warning. Builds on Task 106's fallback search.
user_benefit: Automatically finds specs saved in iCloud Drive without users needing to type complex paths
